name: Daemon Battleship
description: The Daemon Battleship is designed to decimate enemy targets, gaining increased weapon speed and AoE radius when it exits phasing, and drastically increased movement speed while phased.
tips-builds: Before Phasing V2 a elite Daemon could farm fragments to get a behemoth it still can but it\'s more harder now. It\'s best to use binary torpedos and use plasma if you want a farming build.
author: Warmaster
